name: powertrain production, for electric scooter | powertrain, for electric scooter | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/2155/documentation

This dataset describes the production of an electric drivetrain suitable for an electric scooter. It comprises the controller (1.27), the electric motor and the charger (3.025kg). The entries are given on a function of kg of device. The dataset is based on direct inspection of existing commercial devices of current technology.

The dataset brings together all the devices required for the electric drivetrain.

The dataset returns the electric drivetrain and includes the treatment of the used component.
category: C:Manufacturing/27:Manufacture of electrical equipment/271:Manufacture of electric motors, generators, transformers and electricity distribution and control apparatus/2710:Manufacture of electric motors, generators, transformers and electricity di

processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: The inspected devices represent a typical technology which is believed to be representative up to 2015.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Direct inspection of a typical devices of common technology.
